cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7080, Nowhere to Hide Oligarchs’ Assets Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 46 (Tuesday, March 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 7080.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H3744]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by the Yeas and Nays: 26 - 23.

title: Nowhere to Hide Oligarchs’ Assets Act
